data.actual_result: Video disables / disappears by itself, and you cannot get it back until after next call where the pattern repeats.
data.expected_result: Video stays on during call, and you are able to use it.
data.short_description: Video Disappears / Disable Itself During Call (Possible for Android 5.1 ONLY)
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a voice call -Click on to show video - Observe your video showing then disappearing.
